Title: The Vest
Writer: Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Meredith Stiehm, Chip Johannessen
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Morena Baccarin, David Harewood
Plot: When the dust settles from an explosion, Saul finds a manic Carrie hospitalized and realizes there may be merit to her wild theories.
